generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA Portable Air Conditioner can be used for air conditioning or heating. QOOLA comes with 4 cooling and heating modes, the temperatures can drop down to the lowest at 59°F (15°C) and the highest at 113°F (45°C), which means you can easily adjust to your desired temperature anytime. Negative Air Ions can remove contaminants such as micro dust, pollens, and other contaminating particles anywhere.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: young people, college students
generations.text: Looking for a portable air conditioner that can also be used for heating? Look no further than the QOOLA Portable Air Conditioner! This handy device comes with four cooling and heating modes, so you can easily adjust to your desired temperature. Plus, the negative air ions it produces can remove contaminants from the air, making it a great choice for people with allergies or asthma.
